mapper.insert: insert into Goods (seller_id, cate_no, goods_name, goods_content, goods_price, goods_writer, seller_company, goods_create_at, goods_image, goods_count, goods_date, goods_pageCount, goods_bookSize, writer_content) values(#{seller_id}, #{cate_no}, #{goods_name}, #{goods_content}, #{goods_price}, #{goods_writer}, #{seller_company}, #{goods_create_at}, #{goods_image}, #{goods_count}, date , #{goods_pageCount}, #{goods_bookSize}, #{writer_content})
